intro.text: In the vast expanse of deep space, the mining vessel 'Hyperion' drifts silently, its hull scarred by two years of relentless cosmic wear.
Inside, the skeleton crew of four carries the weight of isolation and the yearning for home.
Captain Regar stands at the helm, his weathered face a testament to countless decisions that have kept them alive.
As they approach the final leg of their journey, an unexpected signal breaks the monotony of space...
Little do they know, their greatest adventure is about to begin!

inside_ship.speaker: Regar
inside_ship.text: Alright people, we've got an unidentified signal. This close to home, I'm not taking any chances. Status report!

inside_ship.speaker: Susan
inside_ship.text: Analyzing the signal now, Captain. It doesn't match any known patterns in our database.

inside_ship.speaker: Bart
inside_ship.text: Hey Em, want to check out this 'signal' in the observatory later? I hear the view is... stellar.

inside_ship.speaker: Emily
inside_ship.text: In your dreams, flyboy. But speaking of dreams, the engines are operating beyond expected parameters. We might just get home early.

inside_ship.speaker: Regar
inside_ship.text: Focus, people. Susan, any theories on that signal?

inside_ship.speaker: Susan
inside_ship.text: It could be a distress call, or... something else entirely. Logic suggests we proceed with caution.

inside_ship.speaker: Bart
inside_ship.text: Or it could be a party invitation! Two years out here, I'd kill for a good party.

inside_ship.speaker: Emily
inside_ship.text: The only thing you're killing is my concentration, Bart. But... I wouldn't mind a little celebration when we crack this mystery.

inside_ship.speaker: Regar
inside_ship.text: Steady on, crew. Whatever's out there, we face it together. Just like we have for the past two years. Prepare for potential contact.

inside_ship.speaker: Susan
inside_ship.text: Captain! Proximity alarm triggered! Something's approaching fast!

inside_ship.speaker: Bart
inside_ship.text: Emily, if this is our last moment, I just want you to know... your hair looks fantastic even in a crisis.

inside_ship.speaker: Emily
inside_ship.text: Bart, I swear, if we survive this, I'm going to-

inside_ship.speaker: Evil Bug Lord Sneaky
inside_ship.text: Greetings, humans of the Hyperion. Prepare to be assimilated into our glorious hive!

inside_ship.speaker: Regar
inside_ship.text: What in the blazes? Who are you? Crew, battle stations!

inside_ship.speaker: Susan
inside_ship.text: Captain, they're boarding the ship! Hostiles incoming!

inside_ship.speaker: Bart
inside_ship.text: Hey Em, how about we fight these bugs together? I promise I'm great at swatting!

inside_ship.speaker: Emily
inside_ship.text: This is hardly the time, Bart! But... stick close. We might need each other.

inside_ship.speaker: Regar
inside_ship.text: All hands, prepare for combat! We're not going down without a fight!
